data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Luxembourg, Luxembourg not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Luxembourg, Luxembourg
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Luxembourg, Luxembourg.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 377 believers in Luxembourg to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Luxembourg, Luxembourg to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Esch-sur-Alzette
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Esch-sur-Alzette, Luxembourg, Luxembourg.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Luxembourg. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Luxembourg.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Luxembourg, Luxembourg has a population of 37,900.

We estimate Luxembourg has 377 people who might know Jesus, 30,056 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 7,467 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 100 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 37,900 people living in Luxembourg.
